name: GONPIS
description:
Hi there! We... we are Gonpis!

Our home was destroyed... we need to build a new land, a new city!

Follow us and help us doing the designed tasks to start our new home... oh sweet home!

Credits

It's a Jam Game made in 42h for the Z-Jam 21.

Made by:

Alejandro Gonzalez Pano

Flavio Gonzalez Pano
